means: (16世纪西班牙和葡萄牙人用的)小吨位轻快帆船

sentence.Network_en: Please pull in to left, a caravel is going to pass you.
sentence.Network_cn: 请靠左面, 有一架快帆要超越你.

sentence.Network_en: Caravel allows admins to centrally maintain thousands of sites off one code - base.
sentence.Network_cn: 设计成允许非技术人员也能够维护网站内容.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent.: from French caravelle, from Portuguese caravela, diminutive of caravo, via Latin from Greek karabos 'horned beetle' or 'light ship'
